```{r}
library(tidyverse)

dat <- read.csv("./data/data.csv")


dat |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = durationV:int, 
    names_to = "metric", 
    values_to = "val"
  ) |> 
  ggplot() + 
  aes(x = metric, y = val) + 
  facet_wrap(~ metric, scales = "free_y") + 
  geom_point()
```
